qas.question: Beyonce has noted which first lady with saying "She proves you can do it all"?
Which month and year did Beyonce credit Madonna for inspiring her to take control of her career?
Beyonce has said that who embodies the "definition of inspiration and a strong woman"?
Hoe does she describe Oprah Winfrey?
How does she describe Jean- Michel Basquiat?

answers.text: to take control of her own career

qas.question: How does she describe Jay Z?
Who inspires Beyoncé because "she does it all?"
Who does Beyoncé describe as the definition of inspiration?
Who does Beyoncé describe as lyrical and raw?
Who inspired Beyoncé to take control of her career?

context: Beyoncé has stated that she is personally inspired by US <a8_0>First Lady <a0_0><a3_0>Michelle Obama<a8_0/><a3_0/><a0_0/>, saying "She proves you can do it all" and she has described <a2_0><a9_0>Oprah Winfrey<a9_0/><a2_0/> as "the definition of inspiration and <a4_0>a strong woman<a4_0/>". She has also discussed how Jay Z is a <a7_0>continuing inspiration<a7_0/> to her, both with what she describes as his lyrical genius and in the obstacles he has overcome in his life. Beyoncé has expressed admiration for the artist <a10_0>Jean-Michel Basquiat<a10_0/>, posting in a letter "what I find in the work of Jean-Michel Basquiat, I search for in every day in music... he is <a5_0>lyrical and raw<a5_0/>". In <a1_0>February 2013<a1_0/>, Beyoncé said that <a11_0>Madonna<a11_0/> inspired her <a6_0>to take control of her own career<a6_0/>. She commented: "I think about Madonna and how she took all of the great things she achieved and started the label and developed other artists. But there are not enough of those women.".
